transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan sir boliye.
Customer: Haan, main yeh keh raha tha sir aawaz aa rahi hai aapko? To consultation kar do ya aap bol rahe the ki aapko koi issue aa raha tha?
Executive: Haan, bataiye sir, filhal main free hoon, boliye sir.
Executive: Okay, okay, okay. To sir abhi jo apni mail ID hai na, registered mail ID?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Uspe dekhiye main aapko abhi mail kar raha hoon, video meeting link bhej raha hoon. To wahan se aapko bol rahe hain na aapko buylead nahi aa rahi hain aap aisa bol rahe the, right?
Customer: Haan, buylead aur call wagera nahi aa rahe mere paas.
Executive: Theek hai, dobara sahi kar de raha hoon. Haan, bilkul sahi.
Customer: Okay sir, aapko aane lagegi. Abhi aap video meeting pe aa jaiye. Aap iska main video meeting link bheja hai.
Executive: Kyun sir, aa gaya video meeting link aapko?
Executive: Main dekhta hoon main khol ke.
Customer: Sir, abhi tak to nahi aaya sir mail mein.
Executive: Bhej dijiye sir mail ko abhi just abhi bheja hai maine.
Customer: Sir, ab aap WhatsApp par bhej dijiye na aap.
Executive: Kaise?
Customer: Aap WhatsApp par bhej dijiye, isme storage full rakha hai isme Gmail mein.
Executive: One minute. Yeh sir aapka WhatsApp number hai?
Customer: 810
Executive: 810
Executive: Yeh aapka WhatsApp number kyun bata rahe ho?
Customer: 901 hai na sir?
Executive: Nahi nahi, 810.
Executive: One minute.
Executive: Haan sir, 8 810
Executive: 810
Executive: 784
Executive: 784
Executive: 6145
Executive: Hi ka message aaya hua hai sir dekho.
Customer: Abhi tak to nahi, abhi tak to nahi aaya sir abhi tak to.
Executive: Abhi call chal rahi hai is wajah se nahi aaya hoga. Call chal rahi hai network ki is wajah se nahi aaya hoga.
Customer: One minute. Aap check karo sir abhi bheja hai maine.
Executive: Aapka net sir off hai.
Executive: Sir net on hai mera net sir koi problem. Woh net woh aapki baat chal rahi hai is wajah se nahi aa raha woh message wagera.
Executive: Achha achha achha. To fir dono cheeze connect kaise hongi sir? Aap laptop se connect kar rahe ho ya mobile phone se sir? Main mobile se connect kar raha hoon sir main to.
Executive: Mobile phone se? Haan sir.
Executive: To mobile phone se aap connect kar rahe hain to ek dono cheeze ek saath baat kaise hogi sir? Aap aisa kijiye.
Executive: Hmm, ek minute video meeting. Maine aapko WhatsApp par net chal nahi raha hai aapka. Fir fir WhatsApp call bhi kar lenge na, WhatsApp call bhi nahi chalegi.
Executive: Chal jayegi usme koi ek baar woh shuru kar lo nahi to chal jayegi koi dikkat nahi usme to ek baar usko message wagera bhejta hoon. Haan to usi haan theek hai main call kaat raha hoon sir join kar lo aap, theek hai?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer not receiving buyleads and calls.



Resolution:

- Executive resent the video meeting link.

- Executive sent the link on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to join the video meeting.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, video meeting, whatsapp, network
